data.name: Moxina
data.detailed_description:
Moxina is a First person Horror game. You will need to find keys to unlock some path and find ways to escape from moxina. Try to stay alive and don’t lose your way in the forests.

Story
Moxina comes from the pronunciation of Mô-sîn-á in chinese. It is a Taiwan Folklore as it is a child-like ghost that frequently appeared in the forest. It would hypnosis the targeted person and bring him to the forest. By toying with the victims, Moxina would feed the person with turd and insect by illusion.

The story begins with the main character becoming the scapegoat of his neighbour Mr.Huang and it continues...

Graphics
You can enable the effects (Bloom, Film Grain, Motion Blur, Ambient Occlusion) in the setting. It would be highly recommended to turn on the Bloom and ambient occlusion to enhance the game experience. However, It will slow down the fps at the sametime. It's best only when it fits to your computer graphics setting.

Moxina comes from the pronunciation of Mô-sîn-á in chinese. It is a Taiwan Folklore as it is a child-like ghost that frequently appeared in the forest. It would hypnosis the targeted person and bring him to the forest. By toying with the victims, Moxina would feed the person with turd and insect by illusion.

The story begins with the main character becoming the scapegoat of his neighbour Mr.Huang and it continues...

Graphics
You can enable the effects (Bloom, Film Grain, Motion Blur, Ambient Occlusion) in the setting. It would be highly recommended to turn on the Bloom and ambient occlusion to enhance the game experience. However, It will slow down the fps at the sametime. It's best only when it fits to your computer graphics setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6200U 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Gtx 950M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages such as gore, blood and frequent violence.
